author: gstein
msg: Start sketching out the FS editor. In particular, the add_* callbacks.
* subversion/libsvn_fs/editor.c:
(struct edit_baton): add CANCEL_FUNC/BATON, which is needed when
copying streams. remember the pool the TXN lives in, and keep a
member for an open ROOT associated to the TXN.
(FSPATH): helper function to transform a repos_relpath into an fspath
(get_root): open or re-use the txn's root
(add_new_props): for new nodes, it is easy to apply a set of
properties (we don't need to worry about delets). this little
helper applies the new properties.
(add_directory_cb): flesh out with code to add a directory in the FS
(add_file_cb): new code to add a file in the FS
(add_symlink_cb): some incomplete sketchy code for adding a symlink
(add_absent_cb): not allowed. return an error
(complete_cb): close any open root. leave some todo comments
(abort_cb): close any open root. abort the txn.
(make_editor): remember some more stuff in the baton
